mL) salbutamol to 9 mL
s
odium chloride 0.9% to make a solution of 50 mcg/mL.
• Administer 5 mL (250 mcg) of this solution slowly.
• Monitor maternal pulse and stop salbutamol injection if pulse increases >120bpm.
• Do not administer if mother has cardiac disease or severe hypertension.
o if the presenting part is not compressing the cord, place the woman in a left lateral (Sims) position
